description: Document representing an access role search result.

expand.description: The list of expands set for the search request. Expands are optional.

hits.description: The sorted array of search hits. Can be empty.

link.description: URL that is used to get this instance.  This property is computed and cannot be modified.

user_count.description: Number of users assigned to the role.

user_manager.description: Flag whether this role is allowed to manage users or other access roles.

users.description: The users assigned to the access role. Available through expands.

disabled.description: Flag whether the user is disabled.

locked.description: Flag whether the user is locked.

password_modification_date.description: The time, where the password was last modified

preferred_data_locale.description:
The effective preferred data locale of the user. A locale is only considered if the user has at least read
 permission on the locale.

preferred_ui_locale.description: The preferred UI locale of the user.

next.description: The URL of the next result page.

count.description: Returns the count of search hits to include in the page.

start.description: Returns the zero-based index of the first search hit in the page.

previous.description: The URL of the previous result page.

count.description: Returns the count of search hits to include in the page.

start.description: Returns the zero-based index of the first search hit in the page.

query.description: The query passed into the search

select.description: The fields that you want to select.

sorts.description: The list of sort clauses configured for the search request. Sort clauses are optional.

field.description: The name of the field to sort on.

sort_order.description: The sort order to be applied when sorting. When omitted, the default sort order (ASC) is used.

start.description: The zero-based index of the first search hit to include in the result.
